item.title: Get to Know Arduino @ Fablab Belfast
item.description:
Wednesday, October 30, 2013 - 16:24

Want to know what an Arduino is and how to use it?

Arduino is the electronics prototyping platform behind recent years’ explosion in interactive artworks and maker’s projects.

In this workshop you will be introduced to using both the hardware (Arduino) and the software and with these you can build almost anything, from a simple flashing light to a box of tricks that sends you a Twitter message when your houseplants get thirsty!

You will be working with our Arduino’s however, If you would like to bring your own Arduino please do and if you want to bring your own computer, please pre-load it with the Arduino IDE which you can get here:
http://arduino.cc/en/Main/Software

Come to Fablab to find out more about the little computer that is changing the way we can use computing. 

Date: Thursday 14th November 18.00 - 20.00

Where: FabLab Belfast

Places: 6

Cost: Free!

Booking: Contact Adam, Patrick or Steven here.

Tags: 
Arduinoworkshop
